long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart Slither for Chrome Extension is an exciting space-themed snake game that is based on the popular classic snake game. Available for free on the website https://googlesnake.org/, this game offers a unique twist to the traditional gameplay.

In "Smart Slither," players take control of a unicorn snake in the vastness of space. The objective is to collect as many star orbs as possible to earn points. As the snake consumes these star orbs, it grows longer, adding to the challenge. However, players must be cautious and avoid colliding with other snakes that are also chasing after the star orbs. If the unicorn snake bumps into another snake or its own body, the game comes to an end.


Immerse yourself in the captivating world of "Smart Slither" for Chrome Extension. Test your reflexes, strategize your movements, and aim for a high score. Whether you're a fan of the classic snake game or looking for a fresh and exciting gameplay experience, "Smart Slither" is the perfect choice. Visit https://googlesnake.org/ and embark on an interstellar adventure today.
